arts.ttl: Salford crush Colchester to climb into play-off positions
Colchester United take on Salford City in League Two
arts.sum: From predicted line-ups to team news, here's all you need to know can be found below ahead of the clash at the Peninsula Stadium (kick-off 3pm). He is likely to come up against his former Uâ€™s team-mate Ossama Ashley, who made 35 league and cup appearances for the club before leaving to join Salford in the summer of 2023.

It's a battle for the League Two play-offs this weekend as ninth-placed Salford host eighth-placed Colchester with just one point separating both sides. Both sides are just a victory away from leap-...
